definition: Pujiang county in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang
river bank/shore/river drainage ditch (old)
surname Pu
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang
Huangpu River in Shanghai
Pujiang county in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

sentences.english: The ice-free Huangpu River is the main waterway in the Shanghai area.
sentences.chinese: 常年不結冰的黃浦江是上海主要的水路通道。

sentences.english: Huangpu River permanent fountain depicts a group of moving stories of this period.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江邊一組永久性噴泉再現了這段動人的佳話。

sentences.english: Ferry lines across the Huangpu River will be completed within three months.
sentences.chinese: 三個月後還將開闢橫渡黃浦江的渡輪線。

sentences.english: Before modern history , Yangshupu was in the wild Huangpu river alone.
sentences.chinese: 近代以前，楊樹浦是僻處黃浦江畔的荒郊地帶。

sentences.english: The Huangpu River finds its way to the East Sea at around Chongming Island.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江在崇明島附近匯入東海。

sentences.english: The Huangpu River winds its way across the city proper of Shanghai and pours into the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江曲曲彎彎流經上海市區，最後注入東海。

sentences.english: Shanghai stands on the Huangpu River.
The most attractive work of architecture is no other than the Oriental Pearl Tower standing by the bank of the Huangpu River.
sentences.chinese: 最引人入勝的建築物當屬位於黃浦江畔的東方明珠塔。

sentences.english: Living near WGQ or PJ area is preferred.
sentences.chinese: 家住外高橋或浦江鎮地區優先。

sentences.english: Standing here, you find all the Bund, the Huangpu River and the city in sight4.
sentences.chinese: 站在這裏，外灘啊，黃浦江啊，個城市都盡收眼底。

sentences.english: Pujiang Dongshan Locks Factory in pujiang West Station , Transport facilities.
sentences.chinese: 浦江省東山鎖廠位於浦江西站邊，交通便利。

sentences.english: Pujiang Dongshan Locks Factory in pujiang West Station , Transport facilities.
sentences.chinese: 浦江省東山鎖廠位於浦江西站邊，交通便利。

sentences.english: In the park the northwest corner of the floor, overlooking the Huangpu River scenery.
sentences.chinese: 而在園區西北角的樓層上，可遠眺黃浦江畔的風光。

sentences.english: The famous Bund near the Huangpu Riveris a symbol of the culture of history.
sentences.chinese: 在黃浦江著名的外灘，是一種歷史文化的象徵。

sentences.english: Gaoqiao new channel is the first transition section of shoals in Huangpu River.
sentences.chinese: 高橋新航道是黃浦江第一個過渡段淺灘航道。

sentences.english: A night tour on the Huangpu River is really exciting!
sentences.chinese: 夜遊黃浦江真實令人興奮，怎麼說？
